courses.name: General English (Beginner to Upper Intermediate)
courses.durationDetail: Minimum 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break)
courses.tuitionDetail: 1 BLOCK OF ELICOS GENERAL ENGLISH FREE when packaged with any VET course or with purchase of 4 ELICOS Blocks1 ELICOS Block = 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break)($200 per week if enrolled for less than 12 weeks)
